suite.name: Test Zeebe Gateway Health

test.name: Zeebe gateway status should be healthy

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Check Gateway Status Is Healthy
kw.doc: This keyword checks if the Zeebe gateway is healthy.

kw.name: Get Gateway Health
kw.doc: Get the health of the Zeebe gateway. https://docs.camunda.io/docs/self-managed/zeebe-deployment/configuration/gateway-health-probes/
kw.msg: ConnectionError: ('Connection aborted.', RemoteDisconnected('Remote end closed connection without response'))

test.doc: Checks an empty process can be deployed and a process instance can be created.

test.name: Create a process instance with non-existing process

kw.name: GIVEN Create Process Instance
kw.doc: Create a process instance.
kw.msg: zbctl create --insecure --address=localhost instance non-existing-process --withResult: Error: rpc error: code = NotFound desc = Command 'CREATE_WITH_AWAITING_RESULT' rejected with code 'NOT_FOUND': Expected to find process definition with process ID 'non-existing-process', but none found

Return: "Error: rpc error: code = NotFound desc = Command 'CREATE_WITH_AWAITING_RESULT' rejected with code 'NOT_FOUND': Expected to find process definition with process ID 'non-existing-process', but none found\n\n"

kw.name: THEN Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: Checks a process instance cannot be created with a non- existing process.

kw.doc: Terminate workers.
